K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-1: bi bhang+ga gu hya tantra n'i tri ru dra da ma nam n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-3: gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-4: 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-5: de nas phyag na rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-6: gsang ba'i don 'di yang dag zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-7: sgrub dang gnas dang mtshan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa; ;shes rab snying rje gsang dbang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-9: lcags 'dra'i ri dang bya skyibs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-10: nags tshal 'thug dang mchod rten nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-11: zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-12: mche ba gtsigs pa nag po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-13: dkar po g-yas te khros pa'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-14: h'um sgrog me lce 'bar ba'i dbugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-15: dmar ser g-yon te bzhad pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196a-16: spyan dmar me dpung dang 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-0: @196b zla ba rgyas pa lta bu'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-1: nor rgyas dung skyong ser pos dbu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-2: dga' bo nye dga' snyan cha dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-3: dpung pa padma chu lha dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-4: se ral 'dab bzang rigs ldan nag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-5: tsham ngam rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-7: zhal gsum pa ste 'jigs pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-8: sku gsum dag gis rab tu mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-9: pho nya gsum gyis gdug pa 'dul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-10: klu yi gnyen po'i gnod sbyin bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-11: bdud 'dul tshangs pa'i pho nya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-12: zla ba nyi ma dag gi steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-13: glang chen kar ka gser gyi gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-14: brgya byin ser po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-17: bdud 'dul dbang po nyi ma'i steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-18: gnod sbyin zla dang stobs kyi steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-19: klu 'dul ri steng rgya mtsho'i nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-20: sbrul nag 'khyil pa stobs ldan te; ;mkha' dang ri bos mnan pa'i steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-21: gser mdog stobs ldan gnyis kyi gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-22: brgyad khrir zhabs bzhag ri rab mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-24: khams gsum khyab mdzad khro bo 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-26: de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-27: rdo rje me dpung 'od dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-28: de nyid mkha' dang 'byung ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-29: dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-30: bdag po'i sa bon las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-31: zla nyi thod pa rdo rje las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-32: drag po'i rtags ldan gtso bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:196b-33: mdzes ldan sku la yang dag 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-5: mgon po gzi brjid gshin rje'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-6: mdog ser dbyug thos gshin rje 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-7: mdangs ldan ser mo sku la 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-9: 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i klu yi gtso; ;mdog dmar klu 'dul sprul gyi zhags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-10: sgra yi lha mo sku la 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-11: mdog dmar gcod pa'i ste'u bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-12: 'phrin las khro bo gnod sbyin bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-13: ljang nag po con gnod sbyin 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-16: 'gugs pa lcags kyu lcags kyu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-17: sdud pa zhags pa zhags pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-18: sdom pa lcags sgrog lcags sgrog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-19: zhi mdzad dril bu dril bu zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-20: kha sbyor bde dang longs spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-21: chos dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-22: sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis; ;thabs dang shes rab sreg gso mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-24: thig le'i rang bzhin mi shegs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-25: gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-27: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-28: gsang ba'i sngags ni khyod kyis zungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197a-29: las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-0: sdig pa @197b dag ni zhi ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-1: klu dang gnod sbyin bsdigs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-2: bdud rnams ma lus zhi byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-3: dus gsum sangs rgyas byin brlabs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-4: rdo rje can gyi sngags bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-6: bho bho pam n'a g'a aa dhi pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-7: ai dam n'i l'amba ra dha ra sha r'i ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-8: badzra p'a ni hri da yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-9: ya: sa ma ti kra ma tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-10: m'a ku la auta s'a da nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-15: ma ti kra ma tha; ha ra ha ra n'a g'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-16: pra ha ra pra ha ra n'a g'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-17: tstshinda tstshinda n'a ga hri da y'a ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-18: bhinda bhinda n'a ga marma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-19: bi sh'i ryam tu n'a ga sha r'i r'a ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-20: bi spho ta ya n'a ga na ya n'a nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-23: n'a ga bi d'a r'a n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-24: n'a go ta s'a da n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-25: n'i la ba sa n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-26: aa pri ta ha ta ba la pa r'a kra m'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-28: kri t'am t'a r'u p'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-31: kusm'am do ta s'a da n'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-32: pra ta pi sh'a tsa bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-33: yaksha aa pasma ra bi na sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-36: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-37: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-38: sarbba bighnam bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat; sarbba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-39: ni l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-40: zhes pa phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-41: sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung gis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-43: ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-44: las thams cad 'grub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:197b-45: de yang rig pa 'dzin pas bsgrub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-1: pas so; ;de yang bla ma la gus shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-2: yi dam dkon mchog la dad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-3: byang chub sems dang sdom pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-4: lha dang sngags la gus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-5: rgyun du rnal 'byor dang ldan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-6: rgyud don don la brtson ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-8: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-9: dam tshig dag las 'das na las rnams mi 'grub cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-10: dag pa med dang don med dag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-11: 'bras bu gang du skye 'gyur zhes zhus pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-12: rdo rje'i dmyal ba'i nang du mi bzad pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-14: de'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam du sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhes zhus pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bshig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-21: thugs dang 'gal bas rdo rje gdan nam zhig tsam na thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-23: rdo rje'i gdan nam 'jig par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-24: nam mkha'i khams kyi sems can thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i 'bras bu thob ste rdo rje gdan 'jig ste thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198a-25: bar ma do dang skye gnas 'jig pa dag yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-0: zla ba'i steng du yi ge aa @198b bkod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-1: chos nyid dag pa'i sngags brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-2: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-3: sarbba dharm'a ta badzra satva h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-4: zhes phyogs bcur kha bltas te rdo rje thal mo sbyar te ye shes kyi 'od kyis gsol ba btab la rdo rje sems dpa'i skur mos par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-7: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-8: rdo rje rdo rje 'jigs byed che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-9: me long me long gsal ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-10: zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-13: chos dbyings chos dbyings rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-14: zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-15: de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-16: so so kun rtog kun rtog bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-18: zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-19: rgya mtsho skyes sku phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-20: rin chen bee d'ur gzi brjid 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-21: mnyam pa mnyam nyid ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-22: zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-23: rin chen rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-24: las kyi sku ste 'phrin las mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-25: bya ba bya ba sgrub pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-26: zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-28: aom aa nanta pa ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-30: a'a karsha ya bam dha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-31: ha ya gri ba bandha sho k'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-32: aom aa pa re aa pa ra dzi ta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:198b-33: ro sha na ye bhya: phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-2: aom badzra kro dha tree lokya bi dza ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-3: m'a ra ya tsitta rbad rbad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-4: aom badzra kro dha mah'a k'a la ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-6: aom badzra kro dha n'a ga h'um phat; m'a ra ya rakta rngubs rngubs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-7: aom badzra kro dha aa mri te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-8: m'a ra ya sod sod rbad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-9: de nas lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis rig pa phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-10: ma h'a de wa m'a ra ya sod sod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-11: ma h'a yaksha aa su ra m'a ra ya ha na ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-12: n'a ga ra dza m'a ra ya dza: dza: ma h'a ma ni m'a ra ya rngubs rngubs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-13: ma h'a bh'um m'a ra ya tishtha tishtha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-14: ma h'a ya ksha m'a ra ya bhinda bhinda /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-15: kharga m'a ra ya khos khos; ma h'a brahma de ye phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-19: m'a ra na ha la ha la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-20: m'a ra na dhu na dhu na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-23: thum ri li li; thum ri li li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-25: bum pa legs par ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-26: sman gsum rtsi sman sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-27: kha di ra yi lo 'dab bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-28: lcags kyi rdo rje'i khong gseng du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-29: gsang ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-30: gnam lcags mchu ni stong pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-31: sprin bral ser ba gcad pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-32: gsang ba'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-34: aom takki tsa ti gu hya li mi sha sha gu gu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-36: hu ya hu ya p'u ra ta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-37: aom badzra p'a ni badzr'a da ki n'i na ga he he /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-40: p'u ru te pu ru te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199a-41: aom manydzu shr'i ya m'anta ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-0: ae ka aa pa @199b ra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-1: aom ma ni padme be sha pra be sha m'a ma ru lu be sha kha thun bhyo: aom brahma sva sti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-2: pushtim su ra koo shi ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-6: ku m'a ra sham ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-36: m'u lam p'u rba sh'a dh'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-38: sha ba na: aa bhi dzi ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-39: sha ta bhi sh'a dha nishth'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-41: autta ra bha dra p'a da /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-42: ree pa ti aa shvi n'i bha ra n'i sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-49: tsandra lo ka p'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-54: aom de ba n'a ga r'a dza su ra gandharbha shtsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-60: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-63: n'a ga hri da y'a ni phu: binda binda /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-65: bi sh'iryantu n'a ga sha r'i r'a ni phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-66: bi spho ta ya n'a ga na ya na ni phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-67: n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-68: n'a gota s'a da n'a ya phu: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-69: yaksha bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-70: yaksha kro dha s'a da n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-71: yaksha n'i la ba sa n'a ya phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:199b-72: yaksha aa pra ti ha ta ba l'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-0: @200a *// yaksha pa r'a kra m'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-1: yaksha kri t'am t'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-2: yaksha kri t'anta r'u p'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-3: yaksha ro sha n'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-4: de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dbang du 'dus par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-5: gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-6: gsang ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-7: de nas cho ga yang dag bshad; ;mandal me tog bcas pa'i steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-8: mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-9: bum pa sngon po mgul chings bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-10: mchod pa rnam lnga dang ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-11: sgrub po dag ni snyung ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-12: rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-13: nad pa dag la yungs sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-14: bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-15: phyag drug rdo rje sdigs pa g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-16: drag po'i thal mos 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-17: tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-18: 'khor du gnod sbyin chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-19: sha za rab 'jigs ral pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-20: gdong ser ser gdong gnod sbyin mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-21: bong bu'i rna ba rna ba 'phyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-22: ral pa gyen 'greng ral gri so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-23: gnod sbyin 'khor de lnga brgya bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-24: yaksha bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-25: yaksha kro dha s'a da n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-26: yaksha ni lam ba sa n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-27: yaksha pra ti ha ta ba l'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-28: yaksha pa r'a kra m'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-30: yaksha kri t'anta r'u p'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200a-31: yaksha ro sha n'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-0: ces brjod de chu la bsngags shing @200b gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-1: gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-2: mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-3: tshon sna lnga dang ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-4: mchod pa lnga dang ldan pas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-5: sgrub po dag ni snyung ldan pas; ;rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-6: nad pa dag la tshon snas bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-7: bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-8: phyag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-9: drag po thal mos 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-10: tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-11: mkhas la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-12: dga' rab dbang phyug thod phreng can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-13: bum sna sen dgu sha za bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-14: btsun mo me tog mdzes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-16: gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-17: ma lus bcas pa'i sngags 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-18: gnad la bor ba'i srog sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-19: pre ta bi sh'a tsi bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-20: pre ta pi sh'a tsa kro dha s'a dh'a n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-21: pre ta pi sh'a tsa n'i lam pa sa n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-22: pre ta pi sh'a tsa aa pra ti ha ta ba l'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-23: pre ta pi sh'a tsi pa r'a kra m'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-24: pre ta pi sh'a tsa kri t'anta r'u p'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-25: pre ta pi sh'a tsa ro sha na ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-26: nyi ma zla ba dag gi bar du rlung la bskyon te tshon sna lngas bcings te bskrad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-27: mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-28: mandal me tog bcas pa'i steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-29: snyung bas khyi yi sha la bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-30: rmi ltas rim pa ldan pas brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:200b-31: brgyad khri zhabs nub 'jigs pa'i me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-2: nag po zhabs gdub gdug pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-3: stobs chen rab tu gnon pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-4: klu chen ma rungs gdug pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-5: nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-6: dga' bo dang ni 'jog po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-8: stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-9: rgya mtsho dag la gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-10: klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-11: sprul pa las la grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-12: glen pa nga rgyal rdzu 'phrul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-14: ma lus pa yi sngags 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-15: gnad la bor de'i rtsa sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-16: ha ra ha ra n'a ga phu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-17: pra ha ru pra ha ra n'a ga pu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-20: bi sh'iryantu n'a ga sha r'a r'i ni phu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-21: bi spho ta ya n'a ga na ya n'a ni phu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-22: n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya phu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-23: n'a ga kro dha s'a dha n'a ya phu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-24: bal po'i se 'u dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-25: smag shad dag gi lcug mes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-27: klu zlog par byed pa'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-30: hi li hi li n'a ga dus dus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-31: klu chen n'a ga'i srog snying ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-32: gnad la bor ba'i srog snying ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-33: lto 'phye dag gi kha nas khar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-34: bcom ldan sku ni gsal bas bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-35: de nas rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-36: las rnams bzhi yis las rnams 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-37: sa gzhi dag ni so sor brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-38: zhi ba dkar zlum padma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201a-40: dbang dmar zla gam lcags kyu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-0: drag po mthing nag @201b rtse gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-1: zhi brgyas pa sor bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-2: khru gang khru do mnyam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-3: dbang dang drag po sor gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-4: khru gang khru do khru gsum khru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-5: 'o ma can dang dri zhim zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-6: 'bras bu dang bcas zhi rgyas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-7: tsher ma dur khrod shing dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-8: kha dog dmar nag dbang drag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-9: ku sha dag kyang dgram byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-10: las kyi bum pas bsang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-11: zhi ba zho dang mar dang ni; ;'o ma dri zhim me tog dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-12: 'bras dang nas dang gro dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-13: zho yi cha dang bsres pa dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-14: rgyas pa zho sbags dkar gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-15: mngar gsum 'bras bu gsum dag ste //yam shing 'o ma lo 'dab bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-16: til ni dkar bo shis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-17: khva dang 'ug pa bya rog brun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-18: ske tshe nim ba nyungs kar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-19: khrag gis sbags pa'i rdzas kun te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-20: yam shing tshor me mar dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-21: sha dang tshil dang gzugs bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-22: til ni nag po shis pa'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-23: shar du bltas na zhi ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-24: byang du bltas na rgyas pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-25: nub tu bltas na dbang du sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-26: lho ru bltas ste gsad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-27: sbyin sreg byas pas las kun 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-28: g-yas brkyang dbang gi 'dug ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-29: g-yon brkyang bas ni gsad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-30: bum pa kha dog sngon po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-31: gnam lcags sor ni bcu drug chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-32: sman lnga 'bru lnga rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-34: dri zhim lo 'dab bcas pa'i shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:201b-35: ba yi rnam lnga khru do tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-0: gru bzhi khru gang zlum po @202a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-1: ste; ;seng ldeng bzhi las byas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-2: phur pa tshon sna dang bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-3: dkar gsum mngar gsum bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-4: gdengs ka can la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-5: grub pa khrus bya bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-6: 'bras chan bu ram hvags dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-7: 'bru yi chan dang dri zhim dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-8: dkar gsum mngar gsum chu dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-9: mdun du byas te phyogs rnams su; ;sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-10: nas dang 'bras dang gro la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-11: la phug sgog pa 'bru la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-12: chang dang bcas ba mdun du dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-21: ba lim ta ta le sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-22: stag dang khab len ti tsha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-23: mandal gru gsum steng du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-24: nag po'i thod pa gri gug can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-25: srung dang ldan pas gsang sngags bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-26: ma h'a k'a la ni r'u pa n'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-27: aom shr'i gri bo be da dza dza ha ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-29: lcags kyi snying phyung zhes pas lcags la bya'o; ;nad kyi srung ba dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-30: byang chub sems dpa'i skur gsal la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-31: snying ga'i sa bon me 'bar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-32: nad kun ma lus bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-33: aom pi dug lum pra ti be ro sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-34: 'bru dang sman dang khur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-35: rin po che dang chang dang sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-36: rkang dang la du dkar gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202a-37: mngar gsum bcas pa'i gtor ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202b-0: chu yi 'gram mam rgya mtshor @202b dbul; ;me tog bdug pa bcas pa dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202b-1: na ma:sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202b-2: gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202b-3: las bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202b-5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba pu n+ya ma ti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-006:202b-6: lotstsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o //
